service.name: MergeExecutionCourses
service.description: This service merges 2 execution courses

service.name: AddCoordinatorByManager
service.description: This service add a coordinator to a execution degree in manager operations

service.name: RemoveCoordinatorsByManager
service.description: This service remove one or more coordinators to a execution degree in manager operations

service.name: ResponsibleCoordinatorsByManager
service.description: This service associate a coordinator to a execution degree with responsible functions in manager operations

service.name: SearchPerson
service.description: Service that find a person by number, name and/or email

service.name: ReadGratuitySituationByStudentCurricularPlanByGratuityValues
service.description: Retrieves gratuity situation associated with this student

service.name: UpdateAndReadGratuitySituationsByStudentNumber
service.description: Retrieves gratuity situations associated with this student

service.name: EditGratuitySituationById
service.description: Servive that edit or create a gratuity situatuion

service.name: DeleteGratuitySituationById
service.description: Servive that delete a gratuity situatuion

service.name: ReadGratuityValuesByDegreeCurricularPlanAndExecutionYear
service.description: Retrieves gratuity values associated with this execution degree

service.name: InsertGratuityData
service.description: This service create a gratuity data about a execution degree, but if already exists only change it

service.name: ReadGratuitySituationListByExecutionDegreeAndSpecialization
service.description: Return a list of gratuity situation of a execution degree or/and specialization or/and situation

service.name: ReadGratuitySituationListByExecutionDegreeAndSpecializationInManager
service.description: Return a list of gratuity situation of a execution degree or/and specialization or/and situation

service.name: WriteStudentAreas
service.description: Modifies areas belonging to student curricular plan

service.name: WriteEnrollment
service.description: Enrolls student in curricular course

service.name: CreatePerformanceGridTable
service.description: Create a performance table that shows students performance

service.name: InsertTutorship
service.description: Associate students to teachers (tutors)

service.name: DeleteTutorship
service.description: Remove students from teachers (tutors)

service.name: ChangeTutorship
service.description: Change tutorship data

service.name: TransferTutorship
service.description: Transfer students from one teacher to another (tutors)

service.name: UserCoordinatorByExecutionDegree
service.description: Verify the user logged is coordinator of this degree

service.name: WriteStudentAttendingCourse
service.description: Writes the attending of a student in an execution course

service.name: DeleteStudentAttendingCourse
service.description: Deletes the attending of a student in an execution course

service.name: ReadStudentCurricularPlanForEnrollments
service.description: Returns information about student enrollments in curricular courses

service.name: UnEnrollStudentFromShift
service.description: Deletes a students enrolment in a shift

service.name: EnrollStudentInShifts
service.description: Enrolls a student in a List of shifts

service.name: PrepareDegreesListByStudentNumber
service.description: Returns a list that the first element is the degree pre-select and the tail is all degrees

service.name: DeleteEnrollmentsList
service.description: Deletes enrolment of student in a curricular course

service.name: ReadCurricularCoursesToEnroll
service.description: Read all curricular course that can be enrolled

service.name: SearchObjects
service.description: Generic service to search all objects of a certain type that have a string property that matches some user input.

service.name: SearchPolymorphicObjects
service.description: Generic service to search all objects of a certain type that have a string property that matches some user input. Inheritance is respected, so searching for Party also returns Person and Unit.

service.name: SearchObjectsByMultiLanguageString
service.description: Generic service to search all objects of a certain type that have a multiLanguageString property that matches some user input.

service.name: SearchExternalUnits
service.description: Generic service to search all external Units that have a string property that matches some user input.

service.name: ReadStudentCurricularPlanForEnrollmentsWithoutRules
service.description: read active or concluded student curricular plan from selected student
